comment.author: sovereignbtc
comment.body:
![image of business with dash](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0961/9054/files/Screen_Shot_2016-08-31_at_12.12.02_AM.png?2440510524532980584)

Hey there, thanks for following my Dash to Adoption budget proposal being submitted to the Dash Masternode System.

Dash is a privacy-center cryptocurrency with instant transactions and a decentralized and autonomous governance structure.  For more background on Dash and my proposal, see my first post here: [The Future of Business: Contracting Directly with the Dash Protocol Part 1](https://steemit.com/bitcoin/@sovereignbtc/the-future-of-business-contracting-directly-with-the-dash-protocol-follow-my-progress)

We left off with me getting ready to transmit my proposal to the Dash Network.  Let’s get on with it!

**Step. 3 Prepare Your Proposal Using Dash Central**

After submitting your pre-proposal to the Dash Forum and receiving adequate feedback, it’s time to broadcast your proposal to the Dash Network.  To do that we will be using two tools, the Dash Core Wallet and the website [DashCentral.org](http://dashcentral.org)

Go to [DashCentral.org](http://dashcentral.org) and setup a free user account

Click on “Budget” at the top of the sidebar and then click “Create Proposal”

Enter a proposal name.  
*NOTE: name cannot have any spaces.  Use a dash in place of spaces*

Enter the block you would like to be paid out on.  
*NOTE: it i recommended that you submit your proposal at least two weeks in advance of the block you want to be paid on so as to allow for adequate discussion*

Enter the amount of Dash you want to receive 
*NOTE: if you want to be paid over the course of several months, choose the amount you want for each month.  For example, if you want to be paid 1000 Dash over the course of three months, you would enter 333.33 for this section*

Enter the payment cycle you would like to be paid out in.  If only one time, choose “one-time payment”.  If more months than one, choose accordingly.  

Finally, enter the Dash address you want to use to receive payment on.  NOTE: This address needs to have 5 Dash and enough for a transaction fee.  It costs 5 Dash to submit a proposal to the Dash Network.  This is to prevent spam.

Now we are ready to use Dash Central to generate the commands we will broadcast through the Core Client.  To do this, click on “Generate Commands”

**Step 4: Sending Commands with QT**

You will then see a couple of commands.  The first of which prepares your proposal for submission. 

 It looks like this:
mnbudget prepare Dash-to-Adoption www.dashcentral.org/p/Dash-to-Adoption 3 531712 Xd4vBLpKrcqSbKui4Pj7LyrmqL25iCN9L5 333.33

To send your prepare submission go to Tools in the menu bar, then debug console. 

From the debug console, open your wallet by entering the following:
"walletpassphrase INSERTYOURPASSPHRASEHERE 60”

Now that your wallet has been opened for transactions, send the prepare command generated through Dash Central.  

Copy and save the hash that is given to you after submission.

Next you wait for six confirmations of the 5 Dash pulled from your address through execution of the prepare command.

Once six confirmations have gone through, enter the submit command which will look likes the one below.  Be sure to copy and paste the hash you recorded earlier in place of REPLACE_WITH_COLLATERAL_HASH

mnbudget submit Dash-to-Adoption www.dashcentral.org/p/Dash-to-Adoption 3 531712 Xd4vBLpKrcqSbKui4Pj7LyrmqL25iCN9L5 333.33 REPLACE_WITH_COLLATERAL_HASH

Once you have sent the submit command, in around 15 to 30 minutes, your proposal will be ready to claim on DashCentral.org

**Step 5: Claiming and Editing Your Proposal**

Once your proposal appears in the budget proposal list on Dash Central, here is how you claim it.  

First, you must be logged in to your Dash Central Account.  

Locate the proposal and click on claim proposal.  

You will now be given the following instructions to verify you are the rightful owner of the proposal.  

Click on "File" -> "Sign message"
Enter address: "XpFgZ7h3WQpZWR8sERtK1zsBMU2PvmH8yM"
Enter message to sign: "dashcentral-proposal-116" (without quotes or spaces!)
Press the button "Sign"

You have now successfully claimed your proposal!  

Next step is to edit your proposal.  Include a title and copy and paste your proposal over from your pre-proposal submission. 

*Note: Write that this is a cross post from Dash Forum and link to your pre-proposal. * 

*Note: Copy the manual vote command for masternodes from Dash Central and paste it at the bottom of your proposal.*

**Step 6: Lobby Masternodes and Respond to Feedback**

Now all thats left to do is lobby your heart out.  Respond to questions that may rise on Dash Central.  Don’t forget to check back on your pre-proposal submission in the Dash Forums. 

Here are three places you can go to stir up some support for your newly submitted proposal:

Slack invitation link: [http://dashchat.co](http://dashchat.co)
Subreddit: [http://reddit.com/r/dashpay](http://reddit.com/r/dashpay)
Forum: [http://dash.org/forum](http://dash.org/forum)

I hope you’ll follow my proposal, see how it’s doing and check back with us in our third installment of The Future of Business: Contracting Directly with the Dash Protocol.

Follow my proposal here: [https://www.dashcentral.org/p/Dash-to-Adoption](https://www.dashcentral.org/p/Dash-to-Adoption)

In Part 3, we will share the exciting conclusion of whether or not my proposal was successful or not.  We will also share more tips we have picked up after submitting two proposals to the Dash Network. 

Peace and love!

John Bush
comment.root_title: The Future of Business: Contracting Directly with the Dash Protocol Part 2
comment.title: The Future of Business: Contracting Directly with the Dash Protocol Part 2
